It was chambered for the Japanese Arisaka 6.5 x 50 mm rifle cartridge and used a short-recoil action. About 3000 were built. *Fedorov- Shpagina Model 1922 Twin barrel magazine fed machine gun. ==G== *GP-25 (Under- barrel grenade launcher - 40x46mm grenade) **GP-30 (Under-barrel grenade launcher - 40x46mm grenade) *GP-95 (Under-barrel grenade launcher -
